title: Pcolormesh Grids and Shading
description: Matplotlib is a data visualization library for Python. It provides a variety of tools for creating static, animated, and interactive visualizations in Python. In this lab, we will learn how to use pcolormesh and pcolor functions in Matplotlib to visualize 2D grids.
